title: 2. Continue with approval (use the run_id and tool_call_id from response)
content:
curl -X POST http://localhost:7777/agents/data_manager/runs/{run_id}/continue \
  -F "tools=[{\"tool_call_id\": \"{tool_call_id}\", \"confirmed\": true}]" \
  -F "session_id=test_session" \
  -F "stream=false"
bash  theme={null}
    export OPENAI_API_KEY=your_openai_api_key
    bash  theme={null}
    pip install -U agno fastapi uvicorn sqlalchemy pgvector psycopg openai
    bash  theme={null}
    docker run -d \
      --name agno-postgres \
      -e POSTGRES_DB=ai \
      -e POSTGRES_USER=ai \
      -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=ai \
      -p 5532:5432 \
      pgvector/pgvector:pg17
    bash  theme={null}
    python hitl_confirmation.py
    ```
  </Step>
</Steps>
